title: The Demon's Fair
description:
Leona’s first All Hallows Eve fair turns into a battle against demons. She’s a powerful siren, but her songs would harm her allies as well as the enemy. The day only gets worse when her boyfriend comes, and drama and jealousy join the fair.



This is a novella, part of the Jinla world, and has a HEA ending.



This story contains spoilers from the Her Royal Harem Series. It is highly recommended that you read at least the first three books before reading this story.
author: Catherine  Banks
